p: In this work, we investigated the vector competence for dengue virus (DENV), Zika virus (ZIKV), chikungunya virus (CHIKV), West Nile virus (WNV) and Usutu virus (USUV) according to the geographical distribution of mosquitoes in eight Western European countries (France-Corsica excluded, Belgium, Germany, United Kingdom, Ireland, The Netherlands, Luxembourg and Switzerland).
